text: 23rd Street is a station on the BMT Broadway Line of the New York City Subway. Located at the intersection of 23rd Street, Fifth Avenue and Broadway in Flatiron District, Manhattan. It is served by the R and W trains. After this station, the next stations will be 28th Street and 14th Street Union Square. ==References== Category:New York City Subway stations Category:Manhattan
title: 23rd Street station (BMT Broadway Line)
